text: INTEM - Intrinsic Pathway activation (F II, V, VIII, IX, X, XI, XII, Heparin) EXTEM - Extrinsic Pathway activation (F II, V, VII, X) FIBTEM - Fibrin activity/contribution to clot firmness (extrinsic activation, platelet neutralization) - Confirms heparin effect (intrinsic activation, heparin neutralization) APTEM - Confirmation of hyperfibrinolysis (extrinsic activation with antifibrinolytic agent)
